title: post-game loading screen takes very long to load
body:
hello, i have notice multiple times that after a game, i am always last to join the lobby again after game. i tried repairing client but no help.
thinking that "Your network might be having trouble transitioning from the game server back to pvp.net. " but how? if no changes to my network has happen. i restarted router, but no help. didn't have this problem in the past. anyone has a idea in what i should try next?

thanks for help

replies.body:
> "Your network might be having trouble transitioning from the game server back to pvp.net."

I feel like this is something I've said in the past, because it's exactly what I'm thinking for this case.  Your network can still degrade over time or might be unstable enough to take a while for your transition to go through.  Meaning, you can still have problems reaching specific services even though everything else might be okay.  

In this case, go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten things up.  Let me know if that helps!
i tried it no help, i have a good computer i can run video max and get over 100fps. my ping avg 39., with the best Verizon can offer. no WiFi, Ethernet. and still. what else can i do?

Don't worry, we'll work with you individually to figure this out!  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will take a look to find more options.  Hang tight until then!

I'm thinking that this player has low spec mode on in the new client, which closes out the client every time the game starts and makes it so you have to relaunch it after the game. While it won't hurt, I don't think messing with their connection is gonna help.

Na, both clients should minimize when the game starts.  Once it's over, it will reppear on screen.  When a match ends, a few things need to happen:

-  Your client needs to know that the game has ended (which will remove the reconnect screen)
- Transfer your connection from the game server and back to pvp.net services

A strong and stable connection will ensure that you get to where you need to go smoothly.  Your client should not be closing out between games.
